analysis.key_quote: Attempting to instigate Schedule F, right in line with the Project 2025 playbook the current lying president tried to distance himself from during the campaign but is blatantly following now that he is in office is straight out of the dictator's playbook.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by equating it with authoritarian practices and politicization of the civil service, indicating a clear stance against the implementation of Schedule F.
